{{Description|"You saw me, you say? You must be mistaken. I was working overtime then."}}
'''Trail of the Qilin''' is [[Ganyu]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This skill generates '''2''' elemental particles when the Ice Lotus hits at least 1 target, and '''2''' elemental particles when the explosion hits at least 1 target.
* {{TalentNote|icd|All DMG dealt by this skill|0|plural=1}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|The Auspicious}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|The Merciful}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|The Clement}}
